review: I had visited the hospital and it was health problem. Doctor was nice and polite but he didn't diagnose problem that I was having properly. He gave me some other medications. I had low blood sugar. He advised antiviral stuff. I was not happy with it. I am not happy with doctor. Medical test was also done. I had bill of 7000 or 8000 rs. I am fine right now. I had good food. Later I was fine. There was some waiting time in the hospital. Diet was also not suggested by doctor. He was friendly. He didn't answer correctly for whatever doubts I had.

We had consulted the doctor for my mother, she had severe back pain and shoulder pain. Doctor was very friendly and helpful. Medicines was prescribed by the doctor.  Scanning and blood test was done. Waiting time was only 30 minutes. My mother is fine now. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends.

We had visited the hospital for my brother, he had high BP so we took him for checkup. He was panel doctor in our company. Doctor was good. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor. There was waiting time in the hospital. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. My brother is fine now.

I had been to doctor regarding the digestion problem / stomach issue. Treatment was fine and tablets was prescribed. Waiting time was less than half an hour. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I was able to recover after treatment. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. My health is good.

Treatment was very fine. I had a issue of vertigo and the doctor prescribed medicine which was helpful. I would like to recommend this doctor to others. I am satisfied with doctor treatment. There was not much waiting time in the hospital and the staff were very cooperative. I would like to give a rating of 8.5/10 to the hospital.

Visiting the doctor, consultation experience was good. He is a good doctor. I will recommend the doctor to my family and friends. Doctor is good, nothing to suggest for improvement. He did give time for the consultation. Am satisfied with the treatment he has given me. Behaviour is good and talks very nicely to us.

*** ********* *** ***** ** **** ** *** ***** *********** right advice and I recovered. I am satisfied with the doctor treatment but the doctor came a bit late and everything was good. I visited for viral fever and throat infection. The doctor gave medicine and it helps to cure the problem. The doctor was very patient to listen to our problem. There was not much waiting time but he came late and everything was good and I will give a rating to hospital 4/5.
Please respect time . Had to wait for more than an hour. If that is the case, Practo shouldn’t show the time slot and all.
Wait time 40 mins ..... Doctor didn't arrive until 11.30 to the clinic. Multiple patients were given appointment for the same time slot too

****** ** ***** I visied doctor as I was suffering from typhoid and malaria, his treatment is also nice but doctor suggested to do all tests when already I have all the reports he didn’t do the treatment, he just gave one simple dose and suggested so many tests from X-Ray to HIV test and all which will cost me 12000rs so I didn’t do and went to some other doctor. I said the doctor it was not a big issue to do all the tests when I already have the report which I did two months back with the same report I showed to another doctor. Doctor he couldn’t find my problem, he said some different problems. Doctor behaves well and he is also good. Hospital is also good. Hospital nurses are also good. From his side was was doing well only I didn't want to do all the test so I didnt visit him again.
